Title(s): ‘De sancto Andrea apostolo historia’; Northern Homily Cycle
Subjects: Andrew, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: ‘De sancto Andrea apostolo historia’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Andrew cristes appostell dereWhils he wond in þis werld here…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …thurgh bisekeng and prayereof saint Andrew þe appostel dere
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.

Emerson,  Oliver F.
